levelList.name: Электрический визг
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain +8 <sprite name="Charge"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Charge">Соль</link></u></color> Count
[EndSkill] Apply +8 <sprite name="Charge"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Charge">Соль</link></u></color> Count to 1 other ally with the least <sprite name="Charge"><color=#f8c200><u><link="Charge">Соль</link></u></color> Count
- Number of affected allies grows by (highest Envy Reson. - 2) (max 3)<style="highlight"></style>

levelList.name: Электрический визг

- Number of affected allies grows by (highest Envy Reson. - 2) (max 4)
- At 4+ (highest Envy Reson.), apply 1 <sprite name="VioletDamageUp"><color=#f8c200><u><link="VioletDamageUp">Повышение урона Завистью</link></u></color> to self and all affected allies<style="highlight"></style>

(3 times max; target loses <sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Кетчуп</link></u></color> Count equal to the number of times it was activated)

levelList.name: Воющая-Миркалла
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[WhenUse] Consume up to 10% of this unit's max HP and deal (HP consumed / 2) damage to all enemies and allies
- At less than 50% of this unit's max HP, inflict and activate 5 <sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Кетчуп</link></u></color> on all allies once instead (lose 1 <sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Кетчуп</link></u></color> Count). Heal HP equal to the amount of <sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Кетчуп</link></u></color> damage dealt to allies<style="highlight"></style>

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 <sprite name="Laceration"><color=#e30000><u><link="Laceration">Кетчуп</link></u></color> on self and the target<style="highlight"></style>

- If target did not have <sprite name="RoseWedge"><color=#e30000><u><link="RoseWedge">Шипы роз</link></u></color>, inflict 4 additional <sprite name="RoseWedge"><color=#e30000><u><link="RoseWedge">Шипы роз</link></u></color> Potency<style="highlight"></style>
